scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a portfolio of 14 posters designed by Lorenzo Homar. The portfolio was completed 29 June 1979 in the Workshop Ramirez Commercial Arts, Inc. in Saint Just, Puerto Rico. The stencils were also cut by Homar. The preparation of the ink and supervision of color was done by Luis Abrham Ortiz.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The posters are arranged as received.
